title: China
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,178 words, Level U (Grade 4), Lexile 850L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and Z
description: China explores the many different aspects of the world's most populous country. From colorful celebrations to the rich history of its people to the the country's animals and landforms, the book shows students how amazing China really is.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
